text: Bear Lake County is a county in the U.S. state of Idaho. As of the 2020 census, 6,372 people lived there. The county seat is Paris, and largest city is Montpelier. == Communities == === Cities === *Bloomington *Georgetown *Montpelier *Paris *St. Charles === Census-designated place === *Bennington === Unincorporated communities === *Bern *Dingle *Fish Haven *Geneva *Giveout *Lanark *Liberty *Nounan *Ovid *Pegram *Raymond *Sharon *Wardboro == References == Category:1870s establishments in Idaho Territory Category:1875 establishments in the United States Category:Idaho counties
title: Bear Lake County, Idaho
